clear_storage_description.description: You are about to reset everything in Designer Tools. All settings, custom grids and designs will be deleted.
clear_storage_description.message: You are about to reset everything in Designer Tools. All settings, custom grids and designs will be deleted.

config_shortcut_description.description: You can use the keyboard shortcuts to do everything in Designer Tools.
config_shortcut_description.message: You can use these shortcuts in Designer Tools.

extension_description.message: Measure and align elements within Chrome

feedback_negative_body.description: Body of the feedback-modal, after a negative feedback has been given.
feedback_negative_body.message: I'm building Designer Tools on my own, so your feedback really helps me get an idea of what I can do to improve the tool.

feedback_negative_placeholder.description: A placeholder shown in the input field where we ask for suggestions or ideas

feedback_negative_title.description: Title of the feedback-modal, after a negative feedback has been given.
feedback_negative_title.message: What can I do to get to 5 stars?

feedback_positive_body.description: Body of the feedback-modal, after a positive feedback has been given.
feedback_positive_body.message: Please also leave your opinion in the Webstore. I'm developing this on my own and it helps me a lot, so I can keep on developing for you!

feedback_positive_title.description: Title of the feedback-modal, after a positive feedback has been given.

feedback_rating_body.message: I could really use your opinion to improve Designer Tools!

feedback_thanks_body.message: Your opinion helps me improve Designer Tools big time. Thanks for being part of the family!

layoutmodal_design_description.message: By overlaying the page with your design you can tweak the pixels to perfection.

storagefull_modal_body.message: Due to limitations in Chrome, you can only store 5 MB. We're looking to fix this issue.

modal_license_activated_body.description: The title shown above the 'Plus subscription active' modal
modal_license_activated_body.message: Your Designer Tools has magically transformed into Designer Tools Plus! Thanks! With your help, I can keep up the development process!

modal_license_activated_title.description: The title shown above the 'Plus subscription active' modal

modal_license_invalid_body.description: The title shown above the 'Plus subscription ended' modal
modal_license_invalid_body.message: Alas! You have reached the end of your Designer Tools Plus membership. You can of course become a member again.

modal_purchase_canceled_title.description: The title shown above the 'Purchase canceled' modal

onboarding_step2_body.description: Text explaining how to use the guides and temporary guides
onboarding_step2_body.message: By hovering a ruler, a temporary guide shows up. Click the ruler to save it. Itâ€™s that easy!

onboarding_step3_body.message: Click on an element to select it. Then, hover over another element to compare its size and distance.

onboarding_step4_body.message: Discover what Designer Tools Plus has to offer!

plusmodal_button_no.description: Text in the button saying 'No, I don't want to pay' (in a different way)

plusmodal_description.description: Promote Designer tools plus. 'only' an X-amount per year. ... around plus features
plusmodal_description.message: For only $PRICE$ per year, you will unlock tons of useful new features (and help me out keeping the development process going)

plusmodal_slide_design.message: Overlay your webpage with the design for pixel perfect precision

plusmodal_slide_distance.description: Short text explaining they won't lose any features
plusmodal_slide_distance.message: And off course, enjoy all the features you're already enjoying

plusmodal_slide_grid.message: Stick to (or break) the grid using the new grid system

plusmodal_slide_infopanel.message: Inspect ALL THE THINGS with the improved Design information panel

plusmodal_title.description: Title of the plus-modal. ... around first sentence, ... around 'Plus!'
plusmodal_title.message: Want to work even faster? Consider upgrading to Plus!

welcomemodal_button_moreinfo.description: Text in the button saying 'More info' (in a different way)

welcomemodal_description.description: Promote Designer tools plus. 'only' an X-amount per year. ... around plus features
welcomemodal_description.message: Introducing Designer tools Plus! Unlock tons of useful features. The $PRICE$ will allow me to relieve you of your working stress.

welcomemodal_slide_darkmode.description: Short text explaining an image showing the Dark mode
welcomemodal_slide_darkmode.message: You asked, I deliver. From now on there is dark-mode support!

welcomemodal_slide_design.message: Overlay your webpage with the design for pixel perfect precision.

welcomemodal_slide_distance.description: Short text about the newly refined design and bugfixes
welcomemodal_slide_distance.message: Version 2 has a Refined design of the rulers and guides. Also, all the bugs are finally fixed!

welcomemodal_slide_grid.message: Stick to (or break) the grid using the new grid system.

welcomemodal_title.message: Welcome to the new and improved Designer Tools!
